div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid info-box-column vc_custom_1584136343912 vc_row-has-fill

br.span: Per order of the Governor, all Illinois schools must be closed through the end of the school year. Breakfast and lunch delivery will continue on regular school days.

p.span: Effective March 30th, any family who has children 18 and under can pick up breakfast or lunch from 9am until 11am at Union School Door F. This is for any families who do not have children attending Union School. Union School families will continue to have their food delivered.

div.p: Union School District 81 serves the educational needs of students in grades K-8.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-orange

p.a: We want to ensure you are kept up to date.
